content: this legal case involves a lawsuit between multiple parties including the eu vl and ü aa the case has been ongoing for three years and is related to the change of ownership in a common property the court ruled that the eu partially satisfies vls counterclaim and pays ü aa 54000 euros in arrears the joint property was sold at a public auction and the proceeds were used to cover auction costs and satisfy the requirements of n ab the remaining money was divided equally among the parties another property an apartment was also sold at a public auction with the proceeds used to cover auction costs and compensate the eu the court rejected the defendants claim to divide a car as joint property the parties are responsible for bearing the procedural costs an appeal can be made within 30 days the court proceedings started in 2019 and various documents have been submitted by the plaintiff and defendant the court made a partial verdict dissolving the marriage and approved a compromise agreement for the division of movable property the court also considered a third partys claim and made a decision regarding it the court dismissed üs claim but accepted their lawsuit for delays in proceedings the court dismissed vls request to amend their counterclaim the court also dismissed an appeal made by vl against a previous decision the case has had preliminary hearings and a compromise was reached the court will announce its judgment publicly the court will consider the circumstances and evidence presented by the parties to determine the outcome of the case the court will apply the family law act to determine the division of joint assets the court will consider the ownership of the property and divide the assets equally unless otherwise agreed upon the court will also consider the termination of joint ownership and the sale of property through public auction the court will distribute the procedural costs equally between the parties the court made a decision to partially annul a certain legal matter in november 2020
